text: nampikkaiyalarkale! Ninkal allahvaiyum, avanutaiya tutaraiyum, avan tantutar mitu aruliya ivvetattaiyum, itarku munnar avan aruliya vetankalaiyum nampikkai kollunkal. Evan allahvaiyum, avanutaiya vanavarkalaiyum, avanutaiya vetankalaiyum, avanutaiya tutarkalaiyum, iruti nalaiyum nirakarikkirano avan niccayamaka veku turamana valikettiltan celkiran
